message.content: {"given_definition_quality":82,"better_definition":"finish class","sentence":"下课了。","image_prompt":"A classroom with a large digital clock showing the end of a lesson, students happily leaving their seats and walking out of the room. Style: soft animation, whimsical, gentle.","sentence_translation":"Class is over."}
